name: auth
descriptionHtml:
Request:

POST : https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/auth

header: 
  "Content-Type":"application/json"
  "User-Agent":"PostmanRuntime/7.29.0"
  "Accept":"*/*"
  "Cache-Control":"no-cache"
  "Postman-Token":"c7c1cca9-523c-439e-ade1-8e13c49e8d9f"
  "Host":"restful-booker.herokuapp.com"
  "Accept-Encoding":"gzip, deflate, br"
  "Connection":"keep-alive"
  "Content-Length":"63"

body: 
  {
    "username" : "admin",
    "password" : "password123"
}

Response:

Code: 200 Status: OK 

   
 
  header:   
  "Server":"Cowboy"
  "Connection":"keep-alive"
  "X-Powered-By":"Express"
  "Content-Type":"application/json; charset=utf-8"
  "Content-Length":"27"
  "Etag":"W/\"1b-NprUECpu7t9iePlyHmqPi7V4emw\""
  "Date":"Thu, 10 Aug 2023 19:53:05 GMT"
  "Via":"1.1 vegur"  
 		 
  
    
 
  body:   
  {
  "token":"839151454bff0e0"
}
